name: rarible-program-library
description: A library of programs maintained by the WEN community

scripts.build-npm: anchor build && npx lerna run build
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.rarible_editions:deploy:solana-dev-net: anchor build -p rarible_editions && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions --provider.cluster https://api.devnet.solana.com --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_editions_controls:deploy:solana-: anchor build -p rarible_editions_controls && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions_controls --provider.cluster https://api.devnet.solana.com --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_marketplace:deploy:solana-dev-ne: anchor build -p rarible_marketplace && anchor deploy -p rarible_marketplace --provider.cluster https://api.devnet.solana.com --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_editions_controls:deploy:eclipse: anchor build -p rarible_editions_controls && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions_controls --provider.cluster https://staging-rpc.dev2.eclipsenetwork.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_marketplace:deploy:eclipse-dev-n: anchor build -p rarible_marketplace && anchor deploy -p rarible_marketplace --provider.cluster https://staging-rpc.dev2.eclipsenetwork.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_editions:deploy:eclipse-test-net: anchor build -p rarible_editions && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions --provider.cluster https://testnet.dev2.eclipsenetwork.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_editions_controls:deploy:eclipse: anchor build -p rarible_editions_controls && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions_controls --provider.cluster https://testnet.dev2.eclipsenetwork.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_marketplace:deploy:eclipse-test-: anchor build -p rarible_marketplace && anchor deploy -p rarible_marketplace --provider.cluster https://testnet.dev2.eclipsenetwork.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_editions:deploy:eclipse-main-net: anchor build -p rarible_editions && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions --provider.cluster https://mainnetbeta-rpc.eclipse.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_editions_controls:deploy:eclipse: anchor build -p rarible_editions_controls && anchor deploy -p rarible_editions_controls --provider.cluster https://mainnetbeta-rpc.eclipse.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
scripts.rarible_marketplace:deploy:eclipse-main-: anchor build -p rarible_marketplace && anchor deploy -p rarible_marketplace --provider.cluster https://mainnetbeta-rpc.eclipse.xyz --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/id.json
